Name: Jin
Description: Jin Kazama is a skilled martial artist with a complex background, known for his Mishima-style fighting and involvement in the King of Iron Fist Tournament.He is one of the main characters of the Tekken series.

Name: Goku
Description: Goku, also known as Kakarot, is a Saiyan warrior from the Dragon Ball series. He possesses incredible strength, agility, and the ability to harness powerful energy, such as the iconic Kamehameha wave.

Name: Kazuya
Description: Kazuya Mishima is a central character in the Tekken series, known for his Devil Gene and intense rivalry with his father, Heihachi Mishima. His fighting style is ruthless and incorporates powerful martial arts moves.
